articles.title: Surfer dead after mauling by large shark off Australia beach - CBS News
articles.description: The 57-year-old man was surfing with friends in the Pacific waters off northern Sydney when the attack happened.
articles.content:
A surfer at a popular Sydney beach was mauled to death by a suspected "large shark" on Saturday, Australian police said, in a rare fatal attack.
